programme.title: The Shanghai Job
programme.desc: Premiere. A washed-up private security agent has to escort a valuable Chinese antique out of Shanghai, but is ambushed during the journey. Action thriller, starring Orlando Bloom, Lei Wu and Simon Yam.

programme.title: An Ordinary Man
programme.desc: Premiere. A war criminal in hiding forms a relationship with his only connection to the outside world - his maid. Drama, starring Ben Kingsley, Hera Hilmar and Peter Serafinowicz.

programme.title: 22 Chaser
programme.desc: Premiere. A tow truck driver risks everything on a desperate quest to become king of the road and provide for his struggling family. Crime drama, starring Brian J Smith, Kaniehtiio Horn and Raoul Max Trujillo.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell.

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me
programme.desc: An international art dealer must befriend a dangerous homeless man in order to save his marriage to a woman whose dreams will lead them all on an extraordinary journey. Drama, starring Greg Kinnear, Renee Zellweger and Djimon Hounsou.

programme.title: Daphne
programme.desc: A hedonistic London thirtysomething chef has her life thrown off balance when she witnesses a violent crime. British drama, starring Emily Beecham, Geraldine James and Tom Vaughan-Lawlor.

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: A London neurosurgeon desperate to attend an operation crosses paths with an American bride determined to get to her wedding. When their chartered flight crashes, they attempt to survive in the wilderness, while fighting their attraction to each other. Romantic adventure, starring Idris Elba, Kate Winslet and Beau Bridges.(n)

programme.title: Heartlock
programme.desc: A male inmate exploits a female guard's emotions to help him escape from prison. Crime drama, starring Alexander Dreymon, Lesley-Ann Brandt and Erik LaRay Harvey.(n)

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: Biopic of Notorious BIG, whose rise to fame took him from being a Brooklyn street hustler and crack dealer to become a respected and influential rap artist, before he was brutally murdered at the age of 24. Starring Jamal Woolard, Derek Luke, Dennis LA White and Angela Bassett.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond.

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: A troubled Navy recruit is prone to violent outbursts and is ordered to see a psychiatrist, who gradually helps the mentally scarred sailor to come to terms with his past and abusive childhood. Fact-based drama, directed by and starring Denzel Washington. With Derek Luke, Joy Bryant and Salli Richardson.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving.

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Biopic of the brilliant American mathematician John Nash, whose prospects of a promising career with the CIA were confounded by paranoid delusions and schizophrenia as the stress of the job proved too much of a burden. Oscar-winning drama, starring Russell Crowe, Jennifer Connelly, Ed Harris, Judd Hirsch, Paul Bettany and Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German Army, and wait for evacuation during a fierce battle in the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's drama, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy and Mark Rylance.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Having sworn revenge against his relative's widow, a young Englishman finds his plans soon change after they finally meet. Drama based on the Daphne Du Maurier novel, starring Rachel Weisz, Sam Claflin and Holliday Grainger.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German Army, and wait for evacuation during a fierce battle in the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's drama, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy and Mark Rylance.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Having sworn revenge against his relative's widow, a young Englishman finds his plans soon change after they finally meet. Drama based on the Daphne Du Maurier novel, starring Rachel Weisz, Sam Claflin and Holliday Grainger.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani.

programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: A troubled teenager moves to a tough inner-city school after her mother's death, but struggles to settle into her vastly different life - until a new boyfriend helps her discover a fresh sense of purpose through the power of dance. Romantic drama, starring Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas and Kerry Washington.

programme.title: Bus Stop
programme.desc: A cafe singer is romantically pursued by a love-struck rodeo cowboy who is determined to win her hand in marriage - if only by persistence alone. Comedy drama, starring Marilyn Monroe and Don Murray, with Betty Field and Arthur O'Connell.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: A former professional basketball player agrees to coach a high-school team, but he is unimpressed by its lack of discipline and instigates a tough new regimen. All goes well until the youngsters start to become complacent, forcing him to take drastic action - which leads to a backlash of complaints from angry parents and pupils alike. Drama, with Samuel L Jackson, Ashanti, Rob Brown and Robert Ri'chard.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: A hard-working construction worker is forced to deal with life-shattering loss when his family are killed in a plane crash. Drama, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Scoot McNairy and Maggie Grace.

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: A service that provides holographic recreations of dead loved ones allows a woman to meet the younger version of her deceased husband. Sci-fi drama, starring Geena Davis, Lois Smith, Jon Hamm and Tim Robbins.

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, oversees the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as opposing sides clash in the face of huge change. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Gillian Anderson and Manish Dayal.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A Marine serving in Iraq finds a photograph of a woman belonging to an unknown fellow soldier, and considers it his good luck charm. When he returns to America, he decides to track her down, and after taking a job at her family's boarding kennels, falls in love with her. Romantic drama, with Zac Efron, Taylor Schilling and Blythe Danner.

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn her husband has died in a car crash - but the next day he turns out to be alive and well. As the past and the future blur into one, she finds herself living the days before and after the tragedy in seemingly random order and tries to find a way to prevent the accident from happening. Supernatural thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and Julian McMahon.

programme.title: 28 Days
programme.desc: A Manhattan newspaper columnist is sent to an isolated mountain retreat to recover from alcoholism, where she strives to get back on the straight and narrow with the help of a womanising sports star and a stern guidance counsellor. Drama, starring Sandra Bullock, Viggo Mortensen, Dominic West, Elizabeth Perkins, Azura Skye and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: A service that provides holographic recreations of dead loved ones allows a woman to meet the younger version of her deceased husband. Sci-fi drama, starring Geena Davis, Lois Smith, Jon Hamm and Tim Robbins.

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, oversees the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as opposing sides clash in the face of huge change. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Gillian Anderson and Manish Dayal.

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss.

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: A TV actor shuffles through life emotionally numbed by the drugs prescribed for him by his stern psychiatrist father. However, he decides to ditch the pills when returning home for his mother's funeral. Free of medication, his apathy begins to lift, and an eccentric local woman reawakens his joy for life. Romantic drama, written, directed by and starring Zach Braff, with Natalie Portman and Ian Holm.(n)

programme.title: The Verdict
programme.desc: A failed attorney takes on a medical case on behalf of the family of a woman left in a coma after an operation in a Catholic hospital. Hoping to earn his fee as fast as possible, he advises both sides to settle out of court. However, soon it becomes clear that the hospital is negligent, and he resolves to bring those responsible to justice. Sidney Lumet's drama, with Paul Newman, Charlotte Rampling and James Mason.(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again: Special
programme.desc: A preview of the romantic musical comedy sequel.(n)

programme.title: The Ottoman Lieutenant
programme.desc: A strong-willed American nurse travels to Turkey on the cusp of the First World War, and soon falls for a dashing Ottoman army lieutenant. Drama, starring Michiel Huisman, Hera Hilmar and Josh Hartnett.(n)

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: A US Navy recruit resolves to overcome racism and become the service's first black diver. However, his superior officers are determined to see him fail, and when he loses a leg, his goal seems impossible - until he receives help from an unexpected source. Fact-based drama, starring Cuba Gooding Jr, Robert De Niro, Charlize Theron and Hal Holbrook.(n)

programme.title: My Feral Heart
programme.desc: Following his mother's death, Luke, a young man with Down's syndrome, moves into a care home. After sneaking out of the house to explore the countryside, he meets a young woman who gives him hope and purpose. Drama, starring Darren Kent, Steven Brandon, Suzanna Hamilton and Pixie Le Knot.(n)

programme.title: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
programme.desc: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his relationship with his wife and their mistress who would inspire the creation of Wonder Woman. Biopic, starring Luke Evans, Rebecca Hall and Bella Heathcote.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving are targeted by the authorities in 1950s Virginia, leading to an historic legal battle. Fact-based drama, starring Ruth Negga, Joel Edgerton and Will Dalton.(n)

programme.title: Crazy Heart
programme.desc: Washed-up country music star Bad Blake is heading for an early grave thanks to his alcoholic, chain-smoking lifestyle on the road. However, when he rides up to play a gig in Santa Fe, he encounters a journalist and single mother whose affection grants him a new lease of life. Drama, starring an Oscar-winning Jeff Bridges, alongside Maggie Gyllenhaal, Colin Farrell and Jack Nation.(n)

programme.title: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
programme.desc: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his relationship with his wife and their mistress who would inspire the creation of Wonder Woman. Biopic, starring Luke Evans, Rebecca Hall and Bella Heathcote.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Wilson
programme.desc: A lonely, neurotic middle-aged man reunites with his estranged wife and meets his teenage daughter for the first time. Comedy drama, starring Woody Harrelson, Sandy Oian-Thomas and Shaun Brown.

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: A singer is transformed from naive country boy to the greatest rock 'n' roll legend of all time - with the traditional stand-bys of sex, drugs, failed marriages, falls from grace, spectacular comebacks and the love of a good woman along the way. Comedy spoof of music biopics, starring John C Reilly, Jenna Fischer and Raymond J Barry, and featuring appearances from Jack Black and Jack White.

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: Killing Hasselhoff
programme.desc: A debt-ridden nightclub owner decides to rig his celebrity death pool, which means killing his pick - the star of Knight Rider and Baywatch. Comedy, starring Ken Jeong, Jim Jefferies and David Hasselhoff.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller.

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The teenagers reunite after their first year at college to spend the summer at a lake house. Jim is concerned by his lack of sexual experience, and goes in search of an old flame, Oz struggles to keep a long-term relationship going, and Finch tries to master the art of tantric sex. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Three kids fall foul of the local bully on their first day at high school, so they advertise for a bodyguard. They end up hiring a man who turns out to be a low-rent mercenary, but discover their new-found protector is not quite the hardened soldier of fortune he claims to be. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Leslie Mann, Nate Hartley and Troy Gentile.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: A convicted jewel thief is released from prison, and sets about recovering his hidden loot - only to discover a police station has since been built where he left it. Undeterred, he poses as a maverick cop and worms his way into the detective division - little realising his problems have only just begun. Comedy, starring Martin Lawrence, Luke Wilson and Peter Greene.

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.

programme.title: Think Like a Man Too
programme.desc: A couple announce they are getting married in Las Vegas, so all their friends descend on the gambling capital. However, the build-up to the big day descends into a bitter rivalry between the male and female guests over who can throw the wildest pre-marital party - despite the efforts of the groom's overbearing mother to disrupt the celebrations. Comedy sequel, starring Kevin Hart and Regina Hall.

programme.title: Table 19
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The teenagers reunite after their first year at college to spend the summer at a lake house. Jim is concerned by his lack of sexual experience, and goes in search of an old flame, Oz struggles to keep a long-term relationship going, and Finch tries to master the art of tantric sex. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: Think Like a Man Too
programme.desc: A couple announce they are getting married in Las Vegas, so all their friends descend on the gambling capital. However, the build-up to the big day descends into a bitter rivalry between the male and female guests over who can throw the wildest pre-marital party - despite the efforts of the groom's overbearing mother to disrupt the celebrations. Comedy sequel, starring Kevin Hart and Regina Hall.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: A playboy meets a beautiful and mysterious woman, and agrees to a casual affair, but then wants more from their relationship. Romantic comedy, starring Terrence Jenkins, Cassie Ventura and Paula Patton.

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap
programme.desc: An ageing British rock band try to revive their fortunes by embarking on a US tour, with a film-maker on hand to record the mayhem. However, the big comeback soon turns into a series of disasters as tensions between the clueless rockers and their long-suffering manager reach breaking point. Spoof documentary, starring Michael McKean, Christopher Guest, Harry Shearer and Rob Reiner.

programme.title: Our Man Flint
programme.desc: The world is rocked by a series of mysterious ecological disasters, while top secret agents from all nations are being murdered. Super-cool American spy Derek Flint is soon on the case, and discovers a fiendish organisation using a weather-controlling machine to hold the world to ransom. Comedy adventure, with James Coburn, Lee J Cobb and Gina Golan.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller.

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for an annual festival, sisterhoods are rekindled and wild sides are rediscovered. Comedy, starring Regina Hall, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish and Jada Pinkett Smith.

programme.title: American Pie: The Wedding
programme.desc: The friends from East Great Falls High reunite to celebrate Jim and Michelle's forthcoming wedding. Though reluctant to invite Stifler to their big day, the happy couple relent - but regret their decision when he plans a bachelor party on the same evening Jim is due to meet the in-laws. The third instalment in the comedy series, with Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan, Seann William Scott, Eddie Kaye Thomas and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: A feminist FBI agent is sent undercover as a contestant in the Miss United States pageant when the event becomes the target of a terrorist bomb threat. As she is not exactly catwalk material, a veteran British coach is brought on board to oversee her transformation into a glamorous beauty queen. Comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen and William Shatner.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureau's publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Fletch
programme.desc: A wisecracking reporter and master of disguise is approached by a businessman who claims to be terminally ill and is looking to pay someone to kill him. The journalist discovers the supposedly dying man is in perfect health, and his strange request is part of a complex scam. Comedy mystery based on Gregory Mcdonald's novel, with Chevy Chase and Tim Matheson.

programme.title: Here Comes the Boom
programme.desc: A biology teacher discovers his school is planning to save money by closing down the music department, leaving his friend out of a job. He puts his college wrestling skills to use and becomes a mixed martial arts fighter, hoping to win enough money to put things right and gain hero status with his students in the process. Comedy, starring Kevin James, Salma Hayek and Henry Winkler.

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for an annual festival, sisterhoods are rekindled and wild sides are rediscovered. Comedy, starring Regina Hall, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish and Jada Pinkett Smith.

programme.title: American Pie: The Wedding
programme.desc: The friends from East Great Falls High reunite to celebrate Jim and Michelle's forthcoming wedding. Though reluctant to invite Stifler to their big day, the happy couple relent - but regret their decision when he plans a bachelor party on the same evening Jim is due to meet the in-laws. The third instalment in the comedy series, with Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan, Seann William Scott, Eddie Kaye Thomas and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: Here Comes the Boom
programme.desc: A biology teacher discovers his school is planning to save money by closing down the music department, leaving his friend out of a job. He puts his college wrestling skills to use and becomes a mixed martial arts fighter, hoping to win enough money to put things right and gain hero status with his students in the process. Comedy, starring Kevin James, Salma Hayek and Henry Winkler.

programme.title: The Escorts
programme.desc: A cash-strapped dad-to-be goes way out of his depth when he unwittingly takes a gig chauffeuring a trio of call girls. Comedy, starring Jason Biggs, Janet Montgomery and Ashley Tisdale.(n)

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: A 40-year-old bachelor decides he has been far too picky in his love life, so he hastily proposes to his girlfriend of several weeks. The future looks rosy as they jet off on their honeymoon, but when he discovers an unpleasant side to his new wife's personality he is tempted to look elsewhere for romance. The Farrelly brothers' comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Michelle Monaghan and Malin Akerman.(n)

programme.title: Clue
programme.desc: Six strangers who are all being blackmailed are summoned to a remote mansion run by a bizarre butler, to meet the man who knows their secrets. When the blackmailer subsequently turns up dead, the guests must uncover which of them is the guilty party - or if someone else is in the house. Comedy, based on the board game Cluedo, starring Tim Curry, Madeline Kahn, Christopher Lloyd, Lesley Ann Warren and Michael McKean.(n)

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
programme.desc: A highly paid executive loses everything after his corrupt boss's false accounting ruins the firm and leaves him to take the blame. Flat-broke and with no income or savings to maintain his lavish lifestyle, he and his wife decide the only way to support themselves is to turn to crime. Remake of the 1976 comedy, with Jim Carrey, Tea Leoni, Alec Baldwin and Richard Jenkins.(n)

programme.title: Meatballs
programme.desc: A summer camp leader's trainee staff drive him up the wall with their endless mischief-making, prompting him to knock them all into shape for an imminent sporting contest. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Harvey Atkin, Kate Lynch and Russ Banham.(n)

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: Jim Levenstein and his old friends return to their home town for a high-school reunion. Struck by how much their lives have changed, they set out to relive the sexual misadventures of their adolescence, but only end up making bigger fools of themselves than they did as teenagers. Comedy sequel to the American Pie movies, starring Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: A teenager plays truant from school and spends the day dragging his girlfriend and a reluctant friend into all manner of crazy adventures in the big city - while the school's dean of students vows to stop at nothing to prove the youngster is faking illness. Comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Mia Sara, Alan Ruck, Jennifer Grey, Jeffrey Jones and Charlie Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey.(n)

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr.(n)

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey.(n)

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: Jim Levenstein and his old friends return to their home town for a high-school reunion. Struck by how much their lives have changed, they set out to relive the sexual misadventures of their adolescence, but only end up making bigger fools of themselves than they did as teenagers. Comedy sequel to the American Pie movies, starring Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A reconnaissance pilot is shot down and becomes stranded in enemy territory after filming evidence of a genocidal massacre by Serb militia in Bosnia. The naval air commander for Nato forces in the Balkans defies orders by mounting an unauthorised mission to rescue him, while the airman faces a battle to stay alive as he is pursued by paramilitary forces. Bosnian War drama, starring Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht and Olek Krupa.

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: A truck driver accepts a challenge to deliver a consignment of beer to a party. He claims he can make the 900-mile round trip in just 28 hours, but a pompous sheriff is determined to stop him in his tracks, not least because his prospective daughter-in-law has deserted his son and hitched a ride with the unlikely hero. Comedy, starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Sally Field and Jerry Reed.

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: A maverick Canadian Mountie poses as a convict to smash a sinister plot involving the sale of human organs, only to find himself facing a desperate fight for survival. Thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Robert Guillaume and Cynthia Gibb.

programme.title: Anon: Special
programme.desc: A feature on the sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen.

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: The armoured avenger hunts for the mastermind behind an untraceable series of bombings, despite being cut off from his usual resources and traumatised by a recent brush with death. His search uncovers a secret conspiracy involving a drug that renders the user indestructible. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Gwyneth Paltrow and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: A paraplegic soldier uses technology that allows him to control a genetically engineered body on a mission to a dangerous jungle world. His assignment is to infiltrate an alien tribe on behalf of a corrupt mining corporation, which wants to drive them from their land. He comes to sympathise with the natives, and helps them fight back against his employers. James Cameron's sci-fi adventure, starring Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Undead warrior Selene fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her. Action-horror, starring Kate Beckinsale, Theo James and Charles Dance.

programme.title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
programme.desc: A group of US marines are called into action when heavily armed militants launch a surprise attack on an embassy in the Middle East. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: A paraplegic soldier uses technology that allows him to control a genetically engineered body on a mission to a dangerous jungle world. His assignment is to infiltrate an alien tribe on behalf of a corrupt mining corporation, which wants to drive them from their land. He comes to sympathise with the natives, and helps them fight back against his employers. James Cameron's sci-fi adventure, starring Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Undead warrior Selene fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her. Action-horror, starring Kate Beckinsale, Theo James and Charles Dance.

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: When thugs steal Keanu the cat, two mild-mannered cousins pose as deadly assassins to get the beloved feline back. Action comedy, starring Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key and Tiffany Haddish.

programme.title: Kiss of the Dragon
programme.desc: A Chinese police officer travels to Paris in search of the head of an international drug ring. However, his target is a corrupt cop who promptly frames him for murder. Fighting to clear his name, he finds an unlikely ally in an American prostitute who offers to testify against the crooked detective in return for help in rescuing her daughter. Martial arts adventure, starring Jet Li and Bridget Fonda.

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: An aspiring martial artist trains under a young Bruce Lee in 1960s San Francisco, and is drawn into a showdown between his mentor and renowned Shaolin master Wong Jack Man. Martial arts biopic, starring Philip Ng, Billy Magnussen and Yu Xia.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose.

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: The alien thunder god returns to Earth when a powerful weapon from the dawn of time is discovered. The device attracts the attention of an old enemy of his people, who intends to use it to plunge the universe into darkness - and to stop him, Thor must form an uneasy alliance with his treacherous brother Loki. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: An aspiring martial artist trains under a young Bruce Lee in 1960s San Francisco, and is drawn into a showdown between his mentor and renowned Shaolin master Wong Jack Man. Martial arts biopic, starring Philip Ng, Billy Magnussen and Yu Xia.

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varley's comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: The alien thunder god returns to Earth when a powerful weapon from the dawn of time is discovered. The device attracts the attention of an old enemy of his people, who intends to use it to plunge the universe into darkness - and to stop him, Thor must form an uneasy alliance with his treacherous brother Loki. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varley's comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose.(n)

programme.title: Volcano: Fire on the Mountain
programme.desc: A geologist tries to convince residents of an idyllic ski community that a nearby volcano is about to erupt - a warning that falls on deaf ears until a deadly earthquake rocks the town. Disaster movie, starring Dan Cortese, Cynthia Gibb, Brian Kerwin and Don Davis.(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: When thugs steal Keanu the cat, two mild-mannered cousins pose as deadly assassins to get the beloved feline back. Action comedy, starring Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key and Tiffany Haddish.(n)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: The armoured avenger hunts for the mastermind behind an untraceable series of bombings, despite being cut off from his usual resources and traumatised by a recent brush with death. His search uncovers a secret conspiracy involving a drug that renders the user indestructible. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Gwyneth Paltrow and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jensen Ames is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to Terminal Island Prison, a facility that broadcasts the highly profitable Death Race, a high-octane event where convicts battle to the death in customised cars. When a popular driver dies, crooked prison warden Hennessey persuades Ames to take his place, claiming he will be released if he is victorious. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jason Statham, Joan Allen, Ian McShane and Tyrese Gibson.(n)

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious island, a top-secret mission to the same region descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriend's father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard.(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: When thugs steal Keanu the cat, two mild-mannered cousins pose as deadly assassins to get the beloved feline back. Action comedy, starring Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key and Tiffany Haddish.(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: A US Air Force veteran ejects his co-pilot from their Stealth bomber in a plan to steal the plane's cargo of nuclear warheads. He uses the weapons to extort money from the American government by threatening to detonate one in a major city. Action thriller, starring John Travolta, Christian Slater, Samantha Mathis and Delroy Lindo.(n)

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious island, a top-secret mission to the same region descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriend's father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A married lawyer has a one-night stand with a business associate while his wife and children are out of town. He hopes to keep his infidelity a secret, but she is determined to continue the relationship, and begins obsessively stalking him and his unsuspecting family. Thriller, starring Michael Douglas, Glenn Close and Anne Archer.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High
programme.desc: A lawman-turned-rancher is attacked by a lynch mob and hanged for a crime he did not commit, but is rescued before he dies. He returns to his former profession to hunt the mob down, but his desire for revenge clashes with his responsibility to bring them to trial alive. Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Inger Stevens, Ed Begley, James MacArthur, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: The Measure of a Man
programme.desc: An unemployed man struggles to support his wife and son on meagre state benefits, while contending with pointless and humiliating bureaucracy as she searches for a job. He is eventually employed as a firm's head of security, only to discover his new position confronts him with a terrible moral dilemma. Drama, starring Vincent Lindon and Karine de Mirbeck. In French.

programme.title: Apprentice
programme.desc: A soft-spoken corrections officer transferred to a high-security prison is taken under the wing of the facility's chief executioner. Drama, starring Firdaus Rahman, Wan Hanafi Su and Mastura Ahmad.

programme.title: The Olive Tree
programme.desc: A young woman embarks on a mission to recover her grandfather's beloved old olive tree, which was sold against his will. Comedy drama, starring Anna Castillo, Javier Gutierrez and Pep Ambros.

programme.title: The Greatest Show on Earth
programme.desc: A circus owner hires a celebrated trapeze artist to perform with his girlfriend as the star attraction - leading to bitter rivalry in the air and sexual tension on the ground. Meanwhile, a clown tries to keep his past a secret, and racketeers prepare to muscle in on the concessions. Cecil B DeMille's Oscar-winning drama, starring Charlton Heston, Cornel Wilde, Betty Hutton and James Stewart.

programme.title: Barracuda
programme.desc: The daughter of a country singer travels to Texas looking for her half-sister. Resentments soon grow between the siblings, and new arrival is determined to claim her share of her father's legacy by any means necessary. Drama, starring Allison Tolman and Sophie Reid.

programme.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
programme.desc: A lawyer risks the wrath of his neighbours in a racially divided backwater in Alabama by agreeing to defend a black man on a rape charge. As he struggles to shield his son and daughter from the case's disturbing undertones, the children also have to confront their fear of a local recluse. Oscar-winning, Depression-era drama based on the classic novel by Harper Lee, starring Gregory Peck, Robert Duvall, Mary Badham and Phillip Alford.

programme.title: The Levelling
programme.desc: A trainee vet returns to her family farm after her brother's suicide and attempts to build bridges with her estranged father. Drama, starring Ellie Kendrick, David Troughton and Jack Holden.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: In a future run by a genetically enhanced elite, a caretaker who was born unmodified is barred from all but the most menial jobs. He swaps identities with a former athlete who has lost the use of his legs in an accident, allowing him to realise his dream of joining the space programme. However, a murder investigation threatens to expose his deception. Sci-fi drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman and Jude Law.

programme.title: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
programme.desc: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his relationship with his wife and their mistress who would inspire the creation of Wonder Woman. Biopic, starring Luke Evans, Rebecca Hall and Bella Heathcote.

programme.title: T2: Trainspotting
programme.desc: After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie. Danny Boyle's sequel to the 1996 drama, starring Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner and Jonny Lee Miller.

programme.title: The Doors
programme.desc: Biopic charting the rise and fall of Jim Morrison, lead singer of the Doors. As the band rise to fame in the 1960s, Morrison experiments with hallucinogenics and occultism, ultimately descending into alcoholism and addiction before his early death at the age of 27. Directed by Oliver Stone and starring Val Kilmer, Meg Ryan, Kyle MacLachlan, Michael Madsen, Kevin Dillon, Michael Wincott and Frank Whaley.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Ageing outlaws, bound by a private code of honour and friendship, find themselves at odds with early 20th-century society, and come to realise their era has passed. Hired to steal guns for a tyrannical Mexican general, they instead decide to turn against him. Sam Peckinpah's Western, starring William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan, Warren Oates, Strother Martin and Edmond O'Brien.

programme.title: After the Storm
programme.desc: Following the death of his father, a private detective struggles to find child support money and reconnect with his son and ex-wife. Comedy drama, starring Hiroshi Abe, Yoko Maki and Satomi Kobayashi. In Japanese.

programme.title: Graduation
programme.desc: A Romanian doctor is desperate for his daughter to win a scholarship to study in England, so he does everything he can to help her pass a life-changing exam. Drama, starring Adrian Titieni and Maria Dragus.

programme.title: The Childhood of a Leader
programme.desc: Ignored by his distant, disciplinarian parents, youngster Prescott develops into an ego-driven brat whose behaviour becomes increasingly unsettling. Psychological drama, starring Berenice Bejo, Liam Cunningham, Stacy Martin and Tom Sweet.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
programme.desc: Two notorious outlaws' routine of bank and train robberies is cut short when a seemingly unstoppable posse is formed to catch them. The pair plan to flee America and start a new life in Bolivia, with the Sundance Kid's schoolmistress lover in tow - but staying ahead of the law is not so easy. Western, starring Paul Newman, Robert Redford and Katharine Ross.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: An Interpol agent and a district attorney discover a major international bank is involved in a vast range of illegal activities, from insider trading to arms deals and bringing down governments. As they battle to expose the truth, they find the corrupt organisation not only has the law on its side, but will kill to keep the secrets safe. Thriller, starring Clive Owen and Naomi Watts.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox.

programme.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
programme.desc: Two notorious outlaws' routine of bank and train robberies is cut short when a seemingly unstoppable posse is formed to catch them. The pair plan to flee America and start a new life in Bolivia, with the Sundance Kid's schoolmistress lover in tow - but staying ahead of the law is not so easy. Western, starring Paul Newman, Robert Redford and Katharine Ross.

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: Devoted husband and father Michael Sullivan leads a secret life as a hitman, but faces a crisis when his son witnesses his involvement in a killing. The lad promises to keep his mouth shut, but one of Sullivan's fellow gangsters wipes out the rest of his family - forcing father and son to go on the run together. Sam Mendes' crime drama set in Depression-era Chicago, starring Tom Hanks, Paul Newman, Jude Law, Daniel Craig and Jennifer Jason Leigh.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: The story of 1970s drug kingpin Frank Lucas, whose innovative methods of smuggling heroin into the US made him one of the leading figures in the New York underworld. A detective is assigned to bring Lucas's empire down, but his investigation is undermined by police corruption. Ridley Scott's fact-based crime drama, starring Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Josh Brolin.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Knows What
programme.desc: A heroin addict roams the streets of New York trying to raise enough money to support her habit. She remains desperately devoted to her neglectful boyfriend, who drifts in and out of her life, and reaches a turning point in her life after he tries to persuade her to commit suicide. Drama, starring Arielle Holmes and Caleb Landry Jones.(n)

programme.title: Tramontane
programme.desc: A blind Lebanese musician embarks on a journey of self-discovery when learns that his true heritage has been kept from him. Drama, starring Barakat Jabbour, Julia Kassar and Toufic Barakat. In Arabic.(n)

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: In a small Bulgarian town, a young teacher is looking for the robber in her class so she can teach him a lesson about right and wrong. However, when she gets in debt to loan sharks, she faces her own problems. Drama, starring Margita Gosheva, Ivan Barnev and Ivan Savov.(n)

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson.(n)

programme.title: Flirting With Love
programme.desc: Constant distractions hamper a pair of struggling New York actors who retreat to the country to work on a script. Comedy, starring Marisa Tomei, Sam Rockwell and Ivan Martin.(n)

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A socially inept high-school student and his lonely unemployed brother find their eccentric home life thrown into upheaval when their meddling uncle comes to stay. The teenage oddball tries to make the best of his changing circumstances, while putting all his skills to the task of helping his new best friend win the class presidency. Comedy, starring Jon Heder, Efren Ramirez and Haylie Duff.(n)

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins.(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Two middle-aged men embark on a wine-tasting tour in California a week before one of them is due to be married. The groom-to-be is determined to persuade his self-hating, embittered friend to loosen up - while also making it clear he intends to cheat on his fiancee before the week is out. Comedy, starring Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, Virginia Madsen and Sandra Oh.(n)

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: A jaded computer programmer goes to bizarre lengths to get fired from his dull job - but his new laid-back attitude leads to unexpected promotions as his arrogance is taken for supreme self-confidence by unwitting bosses. Satirical comedy, starring Ron Livingston, Jennifer Aniston, Ajay Naidu and Gary Cole.(n)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A single mother is determined to keep her daughter safe from harm when burglars break into their home. The pair hide out in a specially constructed sealed room, but the shelter becomes a prison when the robbers refuse to leave empty-handed. Thriller directed by David Fincher, starring Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Jared Leto and Dwight Yoakam.(n)

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A socially inept high-school student and his lonely unemployed brother find their eccentric home life thrown into upheaval when their meddling uncle comes to stay. The teenage oddball tries to make the best of his changing circumstances, while putting all his skills to the task of helping his new best friend win the class presidency. Comedy, starring Jon Heder, Efren Ramirez and Haylie Duff.(n)

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After an African American photographer and his white girlfriend visit her wealthy parents, he suspects there's more to the locals than meets the eye. Psychological thriller, starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones.(n)

programme.title: College Road Trip
programme.desc: Overprotective police chief James Porter insists on escorting his daughter Melanie on a road trip across America when she is invited for an interview at a prestigious college 800 miles from home - but the journey soon descends into chaos. Family comedy, starring Martin Lawrence, Raven-Symone and Brenda Song.

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer.

programme.title: Tinker Bell
programme.desc: The mischievous fairy feels her magic powers are not as impressive as those of her friends and tries to change them - but an unforeseen disaster gives her the chance to prove her worth. Disney animated adventure, featuring the voices of Mae Whitman, Anjelica Huston, Lucy Liu and Jane Horrocks.

programme.title: Leroy and Stitch
programme.desc: Animated sequel, which sees the lovable alien and his friends split up as they pursue their own lives across the galaxy. However, they are soon forced to unite when an old enemy escapes from prison and creates an evil duplicate of Stitch - which he then clones, to raise an army and take over the universe. With the voices of Daveigh Chase and Tia Carrere.

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Nemo and dad Marlin set out on an underwater adventure to help their forgetful friend Dory find her parents. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks and Ed O'Neill.

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and the other toys accidently end up in a daycare centre when their owner grows up. At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
programme.desc: A map-maker dreams of locating the lost continent of Atlantis - and gets his chance when an eccentric billionaire invites him to join a team of intrepid explorers. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michael J Fox, James Garner, Jim Varney and Leonard Nimoy.

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer.

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Nemo and dad Marlin set out on an underwater adventure to help their forgetful friend Dory find her parents. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks and Ed O'Neill.

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: Cowboy doll Woody is stolen by an unscrupulous toy collector, who knows he is worth a fortune as a collectible, prompting fearless Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear to lead a daring across-town mission to rescue him. However, Woody is tempted to spend his life languishing in the safety of a museum rather than face the prospect of his owner growing up. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Toy Story 3

Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: Lou
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated Pixar animation about a pile of lost and found items coming together to teach a toy-stealing schoolyard bully a valuable lesson.

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A buccaneer and a blacksmith commandeer a British ship and set sail in pursuit of a pirate captain who has kidnapped a colonial governor's daughter. However, their quarry and his crew are under a curse that turns them into living skeletons - and makes them impossible to kill. Swashbuckling fantasy adventure, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: A New York teenager moves with her parents to a small town, where she quickly gets drawn into a bitter conflict with a local girl - until auditions for a musical give her the chance to outshine her rival. Meanwhile, she faces the challenge of working out how to get back to the big city for her favourite band's farewell concert. Drama, starring Lindsay Lohan, Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly and Alison Pill.

programme.title: The Story of Robin Hood and His Merrie Men
programme.desc: A noble archer attends a royal contest, but on the way home his father is murdered by henchmen of the wicked King John. He assumes the life of an outlaw, gathering a band of followers in Sherwood Forest and fighting to bring justice to the over-taxed poor and avenge his father's death. Adventure, starring Richard Todd, Joan Rice and Peter Finch.

programme.title: Mickey, Donald, Goofy: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: Three cleaners dream of becoming musketeers - and unexpectedly get the chance to make their wish come true when they are made bodyguards to a princess. However, they do not realise the captain of the guard is plotting to kill her and has given them the job because he thinks they will fail. Animated adventure, with the voices of Wayne Allwine, Tony Anselmo, Bill Farmer and Russi Taylor.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A buccaneer and a blacksmith commandeer a British ship and set sail in pursuit of a pirate captain who has kidnapped a colonial governor's daughter. However, their quarry and his crew are under a curse that turns them into living skeletons - and makes them impossible to kill. Swashbuckling fantasy adventure, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: Constantly outshined and outraced by a fleet of hi-tech rookies, former champ Lightning McQueen must find a new way to win. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson, Cristela Alonzo and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Ben Gates sets out to clear the family name when evidence emerges that an ancestor was involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.

programme.title: The Sword in the Stone
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure about King Arthur's first childhood encounter with the absent-minded magician Merlin in a forest. The kindly wizard takes the youngster under his wing and teaches him the ways of the world - leading to an incident with a crazed witch and the event that will change the future king's life for ever. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. Retrieving the object from a wondrous cave, he releases a powerful genie trapped inside, whose ability to grant wishes helps the young hero thwart the villain's plans and woo a princess. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder with the aid of a legendary hero. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison.

programme.title: Cars 3

programme.desc: Wily rogue Captain Jack Sparrow finds an old debt coming back to haunt him. Years before, he sold his soul to the legendary Davy Jones, who has now risen from the depths of the ocean to collect what he is owed - with a giant sea monster at his command. Meanwhile, ruthless trader Lord Beckett is intent on seizing control of the Caribbean, and sets out to turn Jack and his allies against one another. Swashbuckling adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Piglet's Big Movie
programme.desc: The plucky porker is upset when his friends tell him he is too small to come honey-harvesting with them, so he embarks on an adventure of his own - and it is not long before his pals start to miss him and realise just how important he is. Animation, featuring the voices of John Fiedler, Jim Cummings and Andre Stojka.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea
programme.desc: An evil sea-witch called Morgana sets her sights on King Triton's trident and decides to use Ariel's daughter to get her wrinkly hands on it. Animated sequel, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Sam Wright, Tara Charendoff, Pat Carroll and Buddy Hackett.(n)

programme.desc: Feature length adventure of the animated series. The daring teenage heroine has to foil the evil Dr Drakken's fiendish plan to take over the world - but she also has to find a date for the prom. While she is delighted when the new boy at school asks her, her acceptance upsets her friend Ron, and prompts the pair to re-evaluate their feelings for each other. With the voice of Christy Carlson Romano and Will Friedle.(n)

programme.title: Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: A downtrodden handyman is forced to look after his niece and nephew. He soon wins them over with his knack for telling exciting stories, but to their surprise the tall tales start coming true - and as the children make their own suggestions, the results become even more incredible. Fantasy comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Guy Pearce and Russell Brand.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans.(n)

Animated adventure spin-off from Pixar's Cars, with the voices of Dane Cook, Teri Hatcher and Stacy Keach.(n)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: The swashbuckling rogues join forces with old foe Barbossa to take on villainous Lord Beckett. But first they have to journey to the ends of the Earth to free Captain Jack Sparrow from his hellish imprisonment in Davy Jones' Locker. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley and Chow Yun-Fat, and featuring a cameo appearance by Keith Richards.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.(n)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: The lost princess from the executed Russian royal family returns to her St Petersburg home with no memory of her heritage. As she tries to retrace her hidden past, two conmen use her in a cunning money-making scheme, little realising the momentous events their duplicity is about to set in motion. Animated adventure, with the voices of Meg Ryan, John Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Monster Family: Special
programme.desc: Take a special look at Sky Cinema original film Monster Family, a spooky animated adventure featuring the voices of Emily Watson, Nick Frost and Jason Isaacs.

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell.

programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.

programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey.

Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee.

programme.desc: A prince and princess have been expected to marry each other all their lives, a prospect they dreaded as children but which they came to look forward to as adults. However, an evil wizard captures the princess and turns her into a swan. Everyone else believes she is dead, but her betrothed sets out to bring her home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Jack Palance and John Cleese.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.

programme.desc: A boy leaves his urban home in search of a real tree, and meets the reclusive industrialist who first created the city. The hermit tells the story of a grumpy forest creature who tried to stop him destroying the trees, and inspires the youngster to undo the damage that has been done. Animated fantasy based on the children's book, with the voices of Danny DeVito, Zac Efron and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)

His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt.(n)

programme.desc: A jealous string-pulled cowboy doll's status as his owner's favourite plaything is threatened by the arrival of a charismatic hi-tech astronaut figure, who refuses to believe he is simply a toy. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)
